posts.text: Hello this is a post about kitty cats. Cats are the best thing that has ever happened in the history of everyone, and everything. I mean come on cat! They are just fuzzy, and cute, and they make little meows. When I see one I am just like yeah, I need to place my hand on the back of that little guy, and then move my hand from the front of it to it's back. It's almost like it is hard wired into me or something.
